summary: In Spain, an American skydiver is recruited by Western intelligence agents to recover a lost atomic bomb detonator from hostile foreign agents.
cast: Anthony Franciosa|Raquel Welch|Ronald Fraser|Richard Briers|Greta Chi|Tom Adams|Elizabeth Ercy|Ann Lancaster|Tutte Lemkow|Reg Lye|Clive Revill
keywords: espionage|character name as title|forename as title|yacht|parachute
title: Guapa, intrépida y espía
